content: gift card cozy materials a half ounce or so of worsted weight cotton size g crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving in ends small button 3/8 or 7/16 inch abbreviations chain…chain stitch single_crochet…single_crochet slip_stitch…slip_stitch special stitches decrease insert hook through both loops of next single_crochet yo and pull through insert hook through both loops of next single_crochet yo and pull through yo and pull through all 3 loops on the hook 1 decrease counts as 1 single_crochet notes this piece is worked in spirals do not join at the end of each round to use a different size button simply adjust the width of the buttonhole you may also want to move it up a row if you do this this pattern should produce a cozy that fits snugly around your card assuming it is the size of a standard credit card which most are use a bigger or smaller hook if necessary to achieve the fit you want no gauge is given because it takes as long to make a swatch as it does to just whip the thing together finished size 2 25 inches 5 7 cm wide by 3 5 inches 8 9 cm long when closed pattern to start chain 11 round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 10 single_crochet work 2 more single_crochet in same chain turn work clockwise and single_crochet in the unused loop of each chain of the starting chain 9 single_crochet work one more single_crochet in the same space do not join round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 22 single_crochet round 3-18 repeat round 2 flap row 1-5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across the back of the cozy 11 single_crochet *chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across 11 single_crochet * four times total of 5 row row 6 chain 1 turn decrease 7 single_crochet decrease row 7 chain 1 turn decrease 5 single_crochet decrease row 8 chain 1 turn decrease 3 single_crochet decrease row 9 chain 1 turn single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet row 10 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 5 single_crochet finish off sew your button on and you re done the gift card cozy crochet pattern is copyright 2007 by
